otherNames: 我靠打賞徒弟升級, Wo Kao Da Shang Tudi Shengji, I Upgrade by Rewarding Apprentices, Wǒ Kào Dǎ Shǎng Túdì Shēngjí, 我靠打赏徒弟升级, I rely on rewarding apprentices to upgrade, i level up by tipping my apprentices
synopsis: When the master rides on the crane and goes west, what should one do if enemies come knocking at the door? With the awakening of the apprentice rebate system, the more you give to your disciples, the more the master receives in return! Hahaha, dear disciples, come quickly! I, the master, have never kept any secrets!
